definition[0]: to calculate or guess an amount, number, age etc, without being very exact
example[0]: Her fortune was put at £5.5 million.
definition[1]: to calculate and state an amount, without trying to be very exact
example[1]: Official estimates put the storm damage at over $10 million.
example[2]: Net assets are put at about £225 million.
example[3]: Analysts put the break-up value of the company at £3 billion more than its current £6.5 billion capitalization.
